name: http://linksys.com/jnap/macfilter/MACFilter
desc: This service provides access to MAC address filter settings on a router or other network infrastructure device.

GetMACFilterSettings.name: http://linksys.com/jnap/macfilter/GetMACFilterSettings
GetMACFilterSettings.desc: This action gets the MAC address filter settings.

macFilterMode.desc: The current MAC address filter mode.

macAddresses.desc: The list of MAC addresses that the filter mode applies to. If the value of the isMACFilterEnabled parameter is false, this value has no effect.

maxMACAddresses.desc: The maximum number of MAC addresses that can be filtered.

SetMACFilterSettings.name: http://linksys.com/jnap/macfilter/SetMACFilterSettings
SetMACFilterSettings.desc: This action sets the MAC address filter settings.

macFilterMode.desc: The desired MAC address filter mode.

macAddresses.desc: The list of MAC addresses that the filter mode applies to.

errors.ErrorDuplicateMACAddresses: The specified MAC address list contains duplicates.
errors.ErrorInvalidMACAddress: The specified MAC address list contains an invalid address.
errors.ErrorTooManyMACAddresses: The specified MAC address list contains too many addresses.

MACFilterMode.Allow: Only MAC addresses in the list are allowed to join the network.
MACFilterMode.Deny: All MAC addresses except those in the list are allowed to join the network.
